thread.title: Thunder Energies Announces the Appointment of Chief Design Engineer

author: cnbc.com
title: Thunder Energies Announces the Appointment of Chief Design Engineer
text:
TARPON SPRINGS, Fla., March 06, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dr. Ruggero Santilli, CEO and Chief Scientist of Thunder Energies Corporation, a publicly traded company with stock symbol (OTC:TNRG), announces the appointment of Geraldo Dieppa Jr. as Chief Design Engineer. In his new role, Geraldo will lead the Autocad design team for Thunder Energies' Directional Neutron Source (DNS).
Dr. Santilli states: "It is a great pleasure to welcome Eng. Dieppa to Thunder Energies. Prior to his appointment as Chief Design Engineer, Geraldo retired from the United States Air Force where he worked under military clearance as a Technical Sergeant with Aircraft Metals Technology. Eng. Dieppa's skills and personal background provide an ideal addition to our DNS technical team with particular reference to our military applications. We are very excited to have Eng. Dieppa join our company and look forward to working with such a high-caliber individual.‚Äù
